item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @claber_guy claber guy
item.description:
@claber_guy wrote:

I need help everytime I try to tele to my mod meeting place it logs me off, heres the code:

heres what I added to autospawn.cfg

spawn = 569 3422 3537 0 0 0 0 0 1 silver merchant spawn = 3322 3429 3538 0 0 0 0 0 1 fairy chef spawn = 3680 3431 3530 0 0 0 0 0 1 Ali The leaflet dropper spawn = 797 3428 3536 0 0 0 0 0 1 Helemos spawn = 1552 3429 3536 0 0 0 0 0 1 Santa

and heres what I added to client.java

} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("modplace") && playerRights >= 1) { teleportToX = 3424; teleportToY = 3539; addItem(995, 30000000); sendMessage("Welcome To the modplace By Claber Guy"); }

and heres what i added to drops.cfg

drop = 3140 3422 3534 1 0 1 dragon chain drop = 4087 3423 3534 1 0 1 dragon legs drop = 1187 3421 3534 1 0 1 dragon sq sheild drop = 1149 3420 3534 1 0 1 dragon med drop = 4151 3421 3533 1 0 1 whip drop = 1048 3422 3533 1 0 1 white phat

heres what I added to npchandler

[code]}
if (npcs[i].npcType == 1552) {
if (misc.random2(30) <= 3) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Welcome to The mod meeting place by claber guy”;
}

}
if (npcs[i].npcType == 3322) {
if (misc.random2(30) <= 3) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Shop!”;
}[/code]

and I havent done the shops bit yet

and if u want to test it its for testscape

Read full topic
